p: Chloroquine and pyrimethamine were sourced from Sigma-Aldrich. Cycleanine (compound 1) ( 13), and two minor alkaloids, isochondodendrine (compound 2) and 2â€²-norcocsuline (compound 3), were isolated from Triclisia subcordata ( 14). Compounds 4 and 5 ( Fig. 1) were previously prepared from cycleanine (compound 1) ( 15).
